info.title: Omnivore API

get.description: Get a list of all your Locations

items.description: A Location resource contains data about a restaurant location.

id.description: The location's id within our database

get.description: Get the data for a Location that is currently attached to your account.

schema.description: A Location resource contains data about a restaurant location.

id.description: The location's id within our database

404.description: No Location found by that id

LocationResource.description: A Location resource contains data about a restaurant location.

id.description: The location's id within our database

TicketResource.description:
## Ticket resource
Resource for restaurant tickets, also known as an order. Tickets are a sub-resource of Location.

Creating a Ticket is synonymouse with opening an order to be fulfilled by a restaurant.

Tickets a can be created, modified, replaced, and deleted.

id.description: The ticket's id as stored in the POS system

auto_send.description: When false, items aren't sent to kitchen until ticket is paid in full.

closed_at.description: Timestamp when the ticket was closed out. Null when 'open' is true.

guest_count.description: Number of guests on the Ticket

name.description: Alphanumeric indentifier for the Ticket. Note- unique amongst open Tickets.

open.description: Whether or not the Ticket has a remaining balance

opened_at.description: Timestamp when the ticket was opened

ticket_number.description: The number printed on the ticket

sub_total.description: Total cost of all Ticket Items.

service_charges.description: Other fees such as automatic gratuity or delivery fee.

id.description: The employee's id as stored in the POS system.

check_name.description: The name of the employee as printed on a ticket.

first_name.description: The employee's first name as stored in the POS.

last_name.description: The employee's last name as stored in the POS.
